name: National Museum
description: One of the largest museums in India, offering a wide range of collections.

name: Indian Museum
description: The oldest and largest museum in India, with rare collections of antiques.

description: A museum with a collection of ancient artifacts and sculptures.

name: Government Museum
description: The second oldest museum in India, known for its rich collection of artifacts.
